    userInp <- as.numeric(readline("Enter a number to start the Fibonacci sequence: "))


a <- 0
b <- 1

cat("Fibonacci sequence starting from", userInp, ": ")
cat(userInp, " ")


repeat {

  nextFib <- a + b


  if (nextFib > 500) {
    break
  }


  cat(nextFib, " ")

 
  a <- b
  b <- nextFib
}
